Package se.arkalix

Class ArSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.arkalix.ArSystem
  • public class ArSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    An Arrowhead Framework (AHF) system.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ArSystem.Builder
      Builder useful for creating instances of the ArSystem class.

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Returns:
        Human and machine-readable name of this system.

      • localSocketAddress

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress localSocketAddress()
        Returns:
        Address and port number of locally bound network interface.

      • localAddress

        public java.net.InetAddress localAddress()
        Returns:
        Local network interface address.

      • localPort

        public int localPort()
        Returns:
        Port through which this system exposes its provided services.

      • isSecure

        public final boolean isSecure()
        Returns:
        true if and only if this system is configured to run in secure mode.

      • keyStore

        public final X509KeyStore keyStore()
        Returns:
        Key store, which represents the identity of this system.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If this system is not running in secure mode.

      • trustStore

        public final X509TrustStore trustStore()
        Returns:
        Trust store, which contains certificates trusted by this system.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If this system is not running in secure mode.

      • scheduler

        public FutureScheduler scheduler()
        Returns:
        Scheduler being used to handle asynchronous task execution.

      • consumedServices

        public ArServiceCache consumedServices()
        Cache of, potentially or previously, consumed services.

        Searches made in this cache will never trigger any lookup in a remote service registry. The cache is strictly local. It might, however, be updated by any plugins used by this system.

        Returns:
        Service description cache containing services that this system may have considered to consume.

      • providedServices

        public java.util.stream.Stream<ServiceDescription> providedServices()
        Returns:
        Stream of descriptions of all services currently provided by this system.

      • provide

        public Future<ArServiceHandle> provide​(ArService service)
        Registers given service with this system, eventually making it accessible to remote Arrowhead systems.

        It is only acceptable to register any given service once, unless it is first dismissed via the returned handle.

        Parameters:
        service - Service to be provided by this system.
        Returns:
        Future completed with service handle only if the service can be provided.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If service is null.

      • shutdown

        public Future<?> shutdown()
        Initiates system shutdown, causing all of its services to be dismissed.

        System shutdown is irreversible, meaning it the system cannot be used to provide any more services.

        System shutdown can also be initiated by shutting down the scheduler used by this system.

        Returns:
        Future completed when shutdown is finished.

      • isShuttingDown

        public boolean isShuttingDown()
        Returns:
        true only if this system is currently in the process of, or already has, shut down.
